name: The Running of the Beans - GGJ 2021
name_original: The Running of the Beans - GGJ 2021
description:
"The Running of the Beans" requires the player to save the lives of beans by sorting them into their correct bean-points. For some reason, these beans love running into saw blades and deadly lasers, so you have to move quick! Be sure not to get beaned!

Using - Snaps Art Prototype | Construction Site
